channel.title: Go on What, Why, How
channel.description: Recent content in Go on What, Why, How

item.title: Golang
item.description: Getting started hello.go 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hello, world!") } Run directly 1 2 $ go run hello.go Hello, world! Or try it out in the Go repl Variables 1 2 3 4 5 6 var s1 string s1 = "Learn Go!" // declare multiple variables at once var b, c int = 1, 2 var d = true Short declaration
